extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites     (PHYS344 or PHYS343) and (PHYS312 or MATH338) and (PHYS350 or PHYS352).

basic.description: Topics include: the production and measurement of X-rays and charged particles for radiation therapy and nuclear medicine; interactions of radiation with matter and biological materials; interaction coefficients and radiation dosimetry; radiation safety; physics of medical imaging with examples from nuclear medicine, ultrasound and magnetic resonance imaging.
basic.subject: PHYS
basic.title: Introduction to Medical Physics
